title: Permanently suspended for leaving champion select?
body: So, i was in champion select for an aram game and my mom called that food was ready so i left the champion select and went down and ate and went up to play and tried to log in but said i was permanently suspended and to check my email for more information and i dont have access to that email anymore sooooooo yeah, can anyone confirm that you really can get permabanned for leaving champion select?

replies.body: You definitely won't get permabanned for leaving one champion select, and you most likely got an email detailing exactly what happened to warrant this suspension. Since you can't access that email anymore, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can go over everything there!
